name: FixedLine
content:
Antwerpen (1 zone number, folowed by 7 numbers):
32 3 1234567

Diest (2 zone number, folowed by 6 numbers):
32 13 123456

Diest alternative, that passes validation
32 1 3123456

=> strip '+' (plus sign)
=> prefix with country code, 32
=> space after country code
=> followed by all other digits, 8 in total
=> insert a space after the zone number (or after 2nd digit if unknown)
